name: Content Locker for Ultimate Member
author: Md. Sarwar-A-Kawsar

sections.description:
This ultimate member extension plugin will help you to lock content fully or partially. From the admin panel you will be able to set daily content unlocking limit for each user level and you have to assign levels to users by ultimate member plugin.

The following companies are using this plugin:
Affordable Pet Care
SEO Ahmedabad

If you need any custom plugin please feel free to contact for further disscussion.
Fiverr profile link

Regards
sections.installation: Just install the plugin and use [content_locker] YOUR CONTENT [/content_locker]
